title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: PMRI-Based Simulation for Spherical Geometry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can derive formulas for calculating the surface area and volume of spheres through VR simulations
Conduct a design project applying the geometric properties of spheres in a realistic problem context (Siwalan craft production)
Explain the process of measuring the surface area of a sphere through a hands-on experiment using oranges and visualize the results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
